name: Alo Alo's Gold and Red Tomato Soup
keywords: appetizer, cayenne pepper, red wine vinegar, tomato, summer, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Quarter the tomatoes. Push the red and yellow tomatoes separately through a stainless steel sieve into separate containers. (If puree is too thick, add some cold water).
Divide remaining ingredients equally between two containers. Mix well (in separate containers).
Chill the containers for about two hours. To serve simultaneously, ladle each soup into different sides of the same bowl. Garnish with croutons and snipped basil leaves.
